question.text: Are passengers allowed to ride in a caravan that is being towed?

explanation.text: Riding in a towed caravan is highly dangerous. The safety of the entire unit is dependent on the stability of the trailer. Moving passengers would make the caravan unstable and could cause loss of control.

answer.text: Yes, if they are over fourteen
Only if all the seats in the towing vehicle are full
Only if a stabiliser is fitted
